package.name: squirrel_people_tracker
package.description: The squirrel_people_tracker package is intended to act as a single package to collect data from all nodes, that detect or track different features of humans. Some of them include leg detection and tracking via laser data, face detection in rgb(-d)/stereo camera data or full body skeleton tracking in rgbd. The squirrel_people_tracker merges this data and outputs the tracker people as people_msgs/People message and put this information into the knowledge database.
